about_the_game:
Humanity is on the brink of extinction due to a self-inflicted ice age. Navigate the frozen wastes in an ancient military tank fitted with a storage bucket and claw arm. Collect and sell junk, make deliveries between underground settlements, navigate mountainous terrain, and buy upgrades to make your job easier.

Thousands like you have tried and failed to undo humanity’s mistakes. Will your story be different?

Deep Snow Delivery is a game about making deliveries in a snowy wasteland with your delivery tank. Load packages into your storage with the claw arm to maximize storage space and make sure they don’t fall out. Drive carefully through treacherous conditions like mountains, blizzards, fog, weak ice, building ruins, etc. Upgrades can be purchased to make your job easier, like topographic scanners, more storage space, tread spikes, etc.
